Install

Installing JAMScript on MacOS

Preparing your system

We will use the homebrew package manager to install the prequisites of JAMScript. Once homebrew is installed run the following commands:

brew install scons
brew install node
brew install redis
brew install hiredis
brew install libcbor
brew install nanomsg

Installing JAMScript

cd (jamscript folder)
sudo scons install
